html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-01622025-02-25ECCC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Declaring that the Regulations Respecting Reduction in the Release of Methane and Certain Volatile Organic Compounds (Upstream Oil and Gas Sector) Do Not Apply in British Columbia, 2025
PrecisORDER DECLARING THAT THE REGULATIONS RESPECTING REDUCTION IN THE RELEASE OF METHANE AND CERTAIN VOLATILE ORGANIC COMPOUNDS (UPSTREAM OIL AND GAS SECTOR) DO NOT APPLY IN BRITISH COLUMBIA, 2025 in order to suspend the application of the Federal Regulations in British Columbia with the exception of federal works or undertakings as defined in subsection 3(1) of the Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0037 Publication Date: 2025-03-12
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: ORDER DECLARING THAT THE REGULATIONS RESPECTING REDUCTION IN THE RELEASE OF METHANE AND CERTAIN VOLATILE ORGANIC COMPOUNDS (UPSTREAM OIL AND GAS SECTOR) DO NOT APPLY IN BRITISH COLUMBIA, 2025 in order to suspend the application of the Federal Regulations in British Columbia with the exception of federal works or undertakings as defined in subsection 3(1) of the Act.
